srv.srv_setup.create_setup_json(station_data, env_data_template, data_by_env_template)¶

Creates a setup JSON structure for Firebase using station data and templates.

srv.srv_setup.setup_database()¶

Initializes the Firebase database with empty station data.

srv.srv_data.data_scraper.check_request_limit(response, url)¶

Handles rate limits and retries or logs other unexpected responses.

srv.srv_data.data_scraper.fetch_station_data(station_id)¶

Fetch station data from the API and handle errors.

srv.srv_data.data_processor.create_delay_score(delay_info, data_size)¶

Calculate a delay score.

srv.srv_data.data_processor.get_delay_type(delay, cancelled)¶

Return the delay type based on delay duration.

srv.srv_data.data_processor.initialize_line_data(station_id, current_line)¶

Initialize line data in Firebase if it doesn’t exist.
